remarks: The predicate "is a dilation".  (Contributed by NM, 4-Feb-2012.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
dilset.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
dilset.s $e |- S = ( PSubSp ` K ) $.
dilset.w $e |- W = ( WAtoms ` K ) $.
dilset.m $e |- M = ( PAut ` K ) $.
dilset.l $e |- L = ( Dil ` K ) $.
isdilN $p |- ( ( K e. B /\ D e. A ) -> ( F e. ( L ` D ) <-> ( F e. M /\ A. x e. S ( x C_ ( W ` D ) -> ( F ` x ) = x ) ) ) ) $.
$d D x $.
$d F x $.
$d K x $.
$d S x $.
